unnormalised: Boream re bhava, kas bagait basat! Aiz ami Integral Calculuschea ranant ani ashcharyant ubkim martat. Mhaka khobor asa tumi kitem chintat: “Ugh, ganit? Khorench?”. Punn mhojer visvas dovrat, hi vostu khorench thodi boreach aasa, khas korun jednam tumi pollto ki tem koxem zudta. Tem eka machinechem reverse-engineering korchea sarkhem chinta – tumka final product khobor asa, punn tumi tem koxem thodde thodde korun bandlelem tem sodunk sodtat.
normalised: Borem asa ixttaंनो, bottam ghodddi ghalat! Aiz, ami Integral Calculusachea vanya ani ashcharyachakit sonvsarant buddtat. Mhaka khobor asa tumi kiteak chintat: "Ugh, ganit? Khorench?". Punn mhojem aik, hi vostu khorench thodi boreakuch asa, khas korun tumi ti koxim zogddata ti dekhlear. Eka yantrak reverse-engineering kortolea bhaxen chint – tumkam nimanne utpadan khobor asa, punn tumi tem thoddem-thoddem korun koxem bandhlem tem sodunk sodtat.

unnormalised: Tor, Integral calculus *kitem* asa, koxench? Multa, tem eka curve-achea khalchi jagah sodchea vixim asa. Eka sadem disota, nhoi? Tor, eka funky akarachem curve chintat, borech dhorchi sidhi lin nahi va perfect circle nahi. Jagah sodop mhunttlear tem chodd lahan squares kitle borye teren khal basleat tem lekchea sarkhem. Ami integral symbol kitem tori vapurtat tem lamb dhorlelea “S” ∫ sarkhem dista tem dakhoita.
normalised: Tech khatir, integral calculus mhunntlear kiteak? Mullavemponnan, tem eka curve khalichi jaga sodhun kaddpachem asa. Sompem aikota, kiteak? Tor, eka funky akarachea curveachi kalpona korat, bori nirmoll rekha vo purai gol nhoi. Jaga sodhun kaddop mhunntlear khala purai somponn boschea khub lhan choukoni moskacher mevop. Ami eka integral chinhancho vapor kortat je streech kel'lea "S" integral bhaxen dista tem hea gottekarak dakhovpak.

unnormalised: Atam, thodem technical zatat. Ami chodd korun definite ani indefinite integrals-ak yetat. Definite integrals, jem ∫_a^b f(x) dx sarkhem aasa, tumka ek specific number dita – curve f(x) ani x-axis bhitorchi jagah point “a” te point “b” meren. Indefinite integrals, jem ∫f(x) dx sarkhem aasa, tumka functions-achem *gharannem* dita, te "C" constant-an veg-vegllem aasat. Tumchea integrationachea xevttak tem peed divpi "+ C" yad dovrat? Tem kiteak!
normalised: Ata, thoddem tecnikal zaleam. Ami khup pautti definite ani indefinite integralanchea add yetat. Definite integrals, je integral from a to b of f of x d x bhaxen, tumkam eka khasgi ank dita – curve f of x ani x-axisache modli jaga point "a" than point "b" poriant. Indefinite integrals, je integral of f of x d x bhaxen, tumkam functionsachem gharannem dita, sogllim eka constant "C" dharan vegllean. Tumchea integrationachea xevttak ti pesky "plus C" yaad asa? Tech khatir!

unnormalised: Hangachi ek mult bhut sidhant mhunttlear Fundamental Theorem of Calculus. Tem differentiation ani integration-ak zudta. Eko bhag multa, tumi eka functionak integrate korta ani magir result differentiate korta zalear, tumka original function portun mellta. Dusro bhag tumka antiderivatives vaprun definite integrals koxe calculate korunk zatat tem sangta.
normalised: Hangachea mullavem sidhdantanchea bhitor ek mhunntlear Fundamental Theorem of Calculus. Tem differentiation ani integrationak zoddtta. Eko bhag mullavemponnan sangta, tumi eka functionak integrate kortat ani uprant result differentiate kortat, tumkam aslolo function portun mellta. Dusro bhag tumkam definite integrals antiderivatives vaporun koxe calculate korunk zata tem sangta.

unnormalised: Ami eka chodd common exampleacher uloyat: polynomial functions. x^2 sarkhem kitem tori integrate korop chodd sidhem aasa. Power rule vaprun, ∫x^n dx = (x^(n+1))/(n+1) + C, ami sodtat ki ∫x^2 dx = (x^3)/3 + C. Sope disota, nhoi? Khorench, vostu thodi tricky zatat jednam trigonometric functions (sin(x), cos(x), etc) va exponential functions (e^x) sarkhem complex functions mellta.
normalised: Eka khub sadharan udahoronacher uloiat: polynomial functions. x squared bhaxen vostu integrate korop sadhem asa. Power rule vaporun, integral of x to the power of n d x equals x to the power of n plus one divided by n plus one plus C, ami sodhun kaddtat ki integral of x squared d x equals x cubed divided by three plus C. Sompem asa, kiteak? Khorench, vostu thoddi trigo zata je trigonometric functions bhaxen trigonometric functions, sine of x, cosine of x, etcetera, vo exponential functions, e to the power of x.

unnormalised: Punn hi integral vostunchi kuxada kiteak haddchi? Tor, integral calculus-achem bhov real-world applications aasat. Physicant, ami eka object-an travel kel'lem distance calculate korunk zatat tem tachchea velocity function dil'lea promannem. Udharonnachekateer, zaka v(t) = 3t^2 + 2t eka car-achi velocity m/s-ant dakhoita, zalear t=0 ani t=5 seconds bhitor cover kel'lem distance ∫_0^5 (3t^2 + 2t) dt aasa. Engineeringan, integrals jagah, volumes ani moments of inertia calculate korchea khatir crucial aasa.
normalised: Punn hea sogllea integral vostunchi kiteak goroz asa? Tor, integral calculusak zaitim khorea-sonvsarantlim applications asat. Physicsant, ami eka vastuachea velocity function dillea antarachi calculate korunk tatuncho vapor korunk zatat. Udahoronnak, v of t equals three t squared plus two t eka gaddyechea velocity meters per secondant dakhoyta, tor t equals zero ani t equals five secondsache modli antarachi vedi integral from zero to five of three t squared plus two t d t. Engineeringant, integrals mahatvache asat jagachi, volyumsachi, ani moments of inertiachi calculate korpak.

unnormalised: Economics-an sudhdha, integral calculus total revenue ani cost functions determine korunk madat korta, marginal revenue ani costacher adharit. Consumer surplus calculate korchea khatir vapurcho chinta. Tem fakt kitem tori abstract mathematical concept nhoi je textbookan band zalea. Tem zaiteach veg-vegllea fields-ant ek vital tool aasa.
normalised: Economikstant legit, integral calculus total revenue ani cost functions nirdharit korpak madad korta, marginal revenue ani costacher adharit. Consumer surplusachi calculate korpak vaportoleachi kalpona korat. Tem fakt kiteakui abstract ganitache gottekaracher ttipnnamant bhairamundi marunk naka. Ti zaiti veg-vegllea kshetrant ek jivall upkaronn asa.

unnormalised: Tor, thoim tumkam asa – Integral Calculus-achem ek jhalak intro. Mhaka aasha aasa tem tumkam kitem tacher vishvas divpak ek bori idea dita. Yad dovrat, practice boro korun dita, tor problem sodou ani veg-vegllea applications-ak explore karat. Ani zaka attkun gelam zalear madat magunk bhiunk naka. Happy integrating!
normalised: Tech khatir, thodkem ani ghanerem intro Integral Calculusak asa. Mhaka umed asa tumkam tem kitem asa tachi bori kalpona yeteli. Yaad dovrat, dhadosponn purai zata, tech khatir moska soddyat ani veg-veglle applications soddyat. Ani moddot magpak bhiyak nakat jenna tumi adkun poddtat. Khuxal integration korat!
